import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function Checkout() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const formik = useFormik({ initialValues : { fname:'', mname:'', lname:'', email:'', add1:'', add2:'', }, validate: (values)=>{ let errors ={} if(!values.fname){ errors.fname= 'Enter a name' } if(!values.lname){ errors.lname= 'Enter a name' } if(!values.email){ errors.email= 'Enter a email' } if(!values.add1){ errors.add1= 'Enter an address' } return errors } }) return ( <>
